name: Factory Rush
description:
A short and sweet platformer. What time can you get?

Created to experiment with the Godot Game engine.  Project is open source on Github!

Andrew Jakubowicz (Code, Design)
Nic Alabaster (Design)

Art: 0x72.itch.io

Thank you Stacey and Aiton for playtesting!
